channel.title: [Help T/V If needed] About to start a server [Help T/V If need]
channel.description: Going to start a server and everytime a start one i portfoward and everything and other players cannot connect. Thats my main thing i need help with, but i would like a co owner when i make this server so. hmu in the comments.
